headline: After 7-Month Inquiry, An Estranged Husband Is Charged With Murder
abstract: Ms. Dulos, a mother of five from an affluent Connecticut suburb, was embroiled in a bitter divorce battle at the time of her disappearance.
lead_paragraph: Almost from the moment Jennifer Dulos went missing from her home in an affluent Connecticut suburb on May 24, detectives have kept their focus on the estranged husband with whom she was locked in a bitter divorce battle.
